name: [Alpha] The Escort
description: A mod that will add The Escort(s) and their very special slugpup.<LINE><LINE>Currently implements The Escort and many of their abilities and movement tech. <LINE><LINE>Implemented 1 of 4 endings<LINE>Fully compatible for playing in other campaigns or arena.<LINE>Partial Meadow compatibility (see workshop description for details)<LINE><LINE>Feedback of any sort is HIGHLY appreciated!
